CropPyomo module¶

Created on Mon Nov 4 12:07:19 2019

module: labour pyomo module - contains pyomo params, variables and constraints

Version Control: Version Date Person Change 1.1 11Dec19 M update pyomo constrain rule structure - increase constrain building time by using smart (sparse) set indexing 1.2 16Jan20 M removed yield from cashflow con - it is now separate so it can be combined with yield penalty and crop grazing yield penalty before being multiplied by price.

Known problems: Fixed Date ID by Problem

@author: young
